metadata.title: CVE-2021-39907 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A potential DOS vulnerability was discovered in GitLab CE/EE starting withversion 13.7. The stripping of EXIF data from certain images resulted inhigh CPU usage.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
